Reviews.Title: value for money
Reviews.Author: M. A. Comissiong
Reviews.Content: The phone dose what the add says, love the dual simm feature dose every thing my more expensive smart phone dose and more ,and you cannot beat the price.only con for me is the pre installed ring tones 2 ,just used to a wider choice without having to load stuff on.
